class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Technology required: webcam and microphone.
course_description: This course is an introduction to the interdisciplinary field of sexuality studies. It will explore the diversity of contemporary sexual experience, sexual behavior and sexual identity, and put into question what we take to be natural, obvious or liberatory about these experiences, behaviors and identities.
